net.sourceforge.jnipp.proxyGen
Class ProxyGenerator

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.jnipp.proxyGen.ProxyGenerator
public class ProxyGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

Entry point for invoking the Proxy Generator. This class serves as the entry point to invoke the Proxy Generator and is called from the main package and from the GUI. It coordinates all of the activities required to generate native C++ proxy classes that can be used to automate their Java counterparts on the other side of the JNI.

Version:
$Revision: 1.25 $
Author:
$Author: ptrewhella $

Field Detail

headerGen

private static CPPProxyHeaderGenerator headerGen
Header file generator. This variable contains a reference to the CPPProxyHeaderGenerator instance utilized to generate the declaration file for the C++ proxy class.

implGen

private static CPPProxyImplGenerator implGen
Implementation file generator. This variable contains a reference to the CPPProxyImplGenerator instance utilized to generate the implementation file for the C++ proxy class.

Method Detail

generate

public static java.util.Collection generate(ProxyGenSettings proxyGenSettings)
                                     throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                            java.io.IOException
Public entry point. This method is invoked to generate the C++ proxy header and implementation files for all of the Java classes specified in the supplied settings.
Parameters:
proxyGenSettings - The settings used to control the code generation.
Returns:
Collection of all ClassNode instances that were processed.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException -  
java.io.IOException -  
See Also:
ClassNode, Project

generate

private static void generate(ClassNode classNode,
                             java.util.HashMap alreadyGenerated,
                             ProxyGenSettings proxyGenSettings)
                      throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                             java.io.IOException
Recursive code generation method. This method is the workhorse of the code generator. It is initially called from the public generate() entry point method, but then also possibly calls itself recursively, depending on the settings passed in.
Parameters:
classNode - The ClassNode of the class for which the proxy is to be generated.
alreadyGenerated - Map used to prevent generating already generated proxy.
proxyGenSettings - The settings used to control the code generation.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException -  
java.io.IOException -  
See Also:
ClassNode
